Description: The following statement contains a magic number: try  			{  				// リトライループ  				for (int i = 0; i < 2; ++i)  				{  					try  					{  						if (Proxy == null) return;  						await Task.Run(action);  						return;  					}  					catch (CommunicationException cex)  					{  						((IClientChannel)Proxy).Abort();  						Proxy = null;  						if (i >= 1)  						{  							// これ以上リトライしない  							Faulted(cex);  							break;  						}  						Connect(ServerUrl);  					}  				}  			}  			catch (Exception ex)  			{  				Faulted(ex);  			}
